q1.question: How much can I earn as a host?
q1.answer: Your earnings depend on your property type, location, and availability. Many hosts earn a significant supplemental income.

q2.question: Is my property protected?
q2.answer: Yes! We provide host protection insurance that covers property damage and liability.

q3.question: How do I get paid?
q3.answer: Payments are processed securely through our platform and transferred to your bank account after each successful booking.

q4.question: Can I choose my guests?
q4.answer: Yes! You can review booking requests and guest profiles before accepting any reservation.
